casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

June 14, 2013

[Cite as 0611412013 Case Announcements, 2013-Ohio-2469.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2013-0433. In re Application to Modify Exemption Granted to E. Ohio Gas Co.

Public Utilities Commission, No. 12-1842-GA-EXM. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Public Utilities Commission of Ohio.

Upon consideration of the motion for leave to intervene as appellee of the East Ohio Gas Company, d.b.a. Dominion East Ohio, it is ordered by the court that the motion is granted.
